Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Concerto in G major after Johann Ernst of Saxe-Weimar, BWV 592

c. 1714

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1.
  • 2. Grave
  • 3. Presto

This concerto arrangement, identified as BWV 592a in BWV1,2,2a and listed under BWV 592 in BWV3, is possibly spurious. It is based on an authentic arrangement by Bach, which, in turn, is based on a violin concerto by Johann Ernst of Saxe-Weimar.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 11 · BA 5088-01 · Bearbeitungen fremder Werke · ed. Karl Heller
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5223 · Klavierbearbeitungen fremder Werke III · ed. Karl Heller

1.

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Grave

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

3. Presto

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5
